title: AT-05 JSONL output formatting
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-05 with a JSONL formatting test.

Plan: Add a unit or integration test that captures stdout for OutputFormat::Jsonl and validates required fields.

title: Add GPU auto-select validation and logging
description: Add runtime log output and/or acceptance guidance to confirm GPU backend selection on NVIDIA/AMD and CPU fallback when unavailable.

title: Add chunking and VAD segmentation
description: Implement chunking (200-500 ms) and a simple energy-based VAD that detects speech start/end to segment utterances. Success: silence is skipped and utterances are finalized after a configurable silence timeout.

title: AT-02 missing model returns exit code 2
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-02 with an automated check for missing model errors.

Plan: Add an integration test that runs the CLI with a config pointing to a missing model file and asserts exit code 2 plus error message.

title: Stream transcription output
description: Superseded by push-to-talk flow; streaming partials removed from scope.

title: Docs: update acceptance tests for daemon subcommands
description:
Summary: Update docs to reflect daemon subcommands and model switching workflow.

Scope: Edit docs/acceptance-tests.md to replace `sv --daemon` with `sv daemon start` and add instructions for `sv daemon stop`. Add/adjust a test case describing `sv daemon set-model --size <SIZE> --model-language <LANG>` for reloading models.

Success: Documentation matches the new CLI usage and includes model reload instructions.

Tests/Acceptance: N/A (doc-only). Verify by reading docs/acceptance-tests.md.

title: Add whisper.cpp FFI bindings
description: Integrate whisper.cpp as a vendored dependency or submodule and create minimal Rust FFI bindings to load a ggml model and run inference on a PCM buffer. Include build script to compile whisper.cpp. Success: a small integration test can load the model file and return a non-empty transcript for a short sample buffer.

title: Add daemon mode with socket listener
description: Introduce a daemon mode that listens on a Unix socket for toggle commands. On toggle on, start capture; on toggle off, transcribe and route output to stdout or injection based on config. Provide lifecycle guidance (systemd user unit or foreground flag) and ensure graceful shutdown.

title: AT-06 offline operation
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-06 with a deterministic offline test.

Plan: Add an env-gated integration test (SV_TEST_OFFLINE=1) that runs the CLI in a network-isolated context (e.g., unshare netns when available) and ensures transcription still succeeds; skip if isolation is unsupported.

title: Implement push-to-talk hotkey capture
description: Implement a push-to-talk hotkey listener (default ctrl+`) to start/stop audio capture.

title: AT-04 daemon toggle captures and transcribes
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-04 with an automated daemon toggle flow.

Plan: Use the integration harness with a fake audio source and fake transcriber to start the daemon, send toggle on/off, and assert final transcript output.

title: Add PR CI quality gates
description:
Goals: Add a PR CI workflow that enforces Rust quality gates and matches a single local mise task for reproducible checks.

Plan: Add a mise task (e.g., ci) that runs cargo fmt --check, cargo clippy --all-targets --all-features, cargo test, and cargo build --release; create a GitHub Actions workflow for pull_request to main that runs the same mise task; ensure docs stay aligned with the CI workflow.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: Run mise run ci locally; confirm CI workflow passes on a PR with the same steps.

title: AT-07 GPU auto-select and CPU fallback
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-07 with automated GPU and CPU fallback checks.

Plan: Add env-gated integration tests that verify GPU backend selection logs when SV_TEST_GPU=1 and successful CPU fallback output when GPU is unavailable or SV_TEST_GPU=0.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: SV_TEST_GPU=1 cargo test --test acceptance (AT-07); cargo test --test acceptance (CPU fallback).

title: AT-03 invalid input device returns exit code 3
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-03 with a deterministic test for invalid input devices.

Plan: Add a test that injects a fake audio host or uses a test-only audio selector to return a missing device error and asserts exit code 3.

title: Events socket fan-out and event emission
description:
Add events socket and broadcast JSONL events to subscribers.

Scope:
- Add sv-events.sock path helper.
- Accept multiple long-lived connections and write each event to all.
- Drop slow/broken clients.
- Emit daemon_ready, recording_started/stopped, transcript_final, model_loaded, error.

Success:
- Multiple clients receive the same event.
- Slow client is dropped without affecting others.

Validation:
- cargo test --lib <event fan-out tests>

title: Model pool and language selection
description:
Implement model pool in daemon and language selection control.

Scope:
- Preload a model pool keyed by language/model spec.
- toggle lang=... selects a model from the pool.
- set-language updates active language without recording.
- Emit model_loaded when a model is loaded/activated.

Success:
- Switching languages does not reload a single global model.
- Active language is reflected in events and responses.

Validation:
- cargo test --lib <model pool tests>

title: Add daemon socket toggle control
description: Implement socket-based control commands for the daemon. Use the same binary: sv --daemon starts the service, sv sends toggle requests over the Unix socket. Provide actionable errors when the daemon is not running or the socket is unavailable.

title: Release workflow for binaries
description: Goals: Publish Linux x86_64 release artifacts from GitHub Releases, including a tarball and SHA256 checksum, using a release-triggered workflow.\n\nPlan: Add a GitHub Actions workflow triggered on release tags; build with cargo release profile; package the sv binary into a tarball; generate checksum file; upload assets to the release.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: cargo build --release (local sanity) and gh release view <tag> --json assets to confirm tarball and checksum are attached; verify checksum with sha256sum -c.

title: Initialize Rust CLI skeleton for sv
description: Create a new Rust binary crate named sv with clap-based argument parsing for model path, language, device, sample-rate, format, and vad. Add a config struct and a main entrypoint that validates the model path and prints a startup banner. Success:  starts and validates args;  shows documented flags.

title: CLI/config defaults for language and pool
description:
Add config support for model pool languages and default language behavior.

Scope:
- New config key model_pool_languages (default to [language]).
- Plain  sends toggle lang=<default>.
- Optional CLI flag to override language on toggle.

Success:
- Running  with no args uses configured default language.
- Config merging respects CLI overrides.

Validation:
- cargo test --lib <config merge tests>

title: IPC message types and JSONL helpers
description:
Implement IPC message types and JSONL helpers in a new module (suggest: src/ipc.rs).

Context:
- Control socket currently parses raw strings in src/daemon.rs; no structured messages.
- Events socket will need JSONL message encoding.

Scope:
- Add ApiVersion constant or enum and include in all messages.
- Define ControlRequest (toggle {lang}, status, set-language {lang}, stop).
- Define ControlResponse with ok/error + state/language fields.
- Define DaemonEvent types listed in docs/daemon-ipc-api.md.
- Provide JSONL serialize helper (fn to_json_line) and parse helpers for control responses if needed.
- Add unit tests in the new module for round-trip JSON for 1 command + 1 event.

Success:
- Module compiles and can be used by daemon/control code.
- Tests demonstrate JSONL is stable and includes api_version.

Validation:
- cargo test --lib ipc::tests

title: Auto-download configured model
description: Goals: Download the configured ggml model automatically on startup when missing, using language and size config (auto maps to general model) and allowing a custom install path.\n\nPlan: Add config fields for model language/size and optional model_path, resolve a default data directory, implement a downloader that checks on startup, and wire model selection into whisper load. Update errors to report download failures with actionable guidance.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: Run cargo test; run manual acceptance tests AT-01a, AT-02, AT-04 with a missing model.

title: Implement audio capture pipeline
description: Use cpal to capture mono audio from the selected input device at 16 kHz and feed samples into a ring buffer. Add device listing/selection support. Success: running sv logs incoming audio levels without crashing and respects the --device flag.

title: Transcribe on key release only
description: Run transcription only after key release, using the captured buffer. Emit a single final transcript in plain/jsonl formats.

title: Load config.toml from XDG path
description: Load config from /home/kejne/.config/soundvibes/config.toml. Parse TOML with defaults when keys missing.

title: Document local validation steps
description: Add a validation section to the README that references the MVP acceptance tests and how to run them manually. Success: README contains step-by-step validation instructions tied to docs/mvp/acceptance-tests.md.

title: Control socket commands + JSON responses
description:
Extend control socket to parse commands and return JSON responses.

Scope:
- Support commands: toggle [lang=], status, set-language, stop.
- Return JSON response on the same stream with ok/state/language fields.
- Update client senders to read responses and surface errors.

Success:
-  toggle receives a valid response.
- Invalid commands produce error responses.

Validation:
- cargo test --lib <daemon socket tests>

title: Tests and docs for daemon IPC API
description:
Add coverage for IPC use cases and update acceptance docs.

Scope:
- Extend tests/acceptance.rs or add unit tests for: toggle lang, default language, status.
- Update docs/acceptance-tests.md with new AT entries.
- Cross-link docs/daemon-ipc-api.md if needed.

Success:
- Tests exercise new IPC behavior.
- Docs mention new acceptance criteria.

Validation:
- cargo test --test acceptance --features test-support

title: Fix model selection for language
description: Findings: Model downloads are driven by `model_language` (ModelSpec::filename in src/model.rs), while the configured transcription `language` is used only for whisper inference. Config merging in src/main.rs never derives `model_language` from `language`, and CLI default for `model_language` is auto, so explicit non-auto language still selects general models unless `model_language` is set.\n\nGoals: When `language` is auto, keep general model; when `language` is a specific language and `model_language` is not explicitly set, choose the language-specific model (currently only `en` via .en suffix). Preserve explicit `model_language` overrides.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: Add/adjust tests in tests/acceptance.rs (and unit tests if needed) to cover language-driven model selection; run cargo test --test acceptance (or targeted tests)

title: Add acceptance test harness for Soundvibes CLI
description:
Goals: Provide a reusable integration test harness with injectable audio sources/transcribers and stdout capture for daemon flows.

Plan: Add test-only adapters for audio input and transcription; expose helpers to run daemon loops in tests; document env gates for hardware-dependent tests.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: cargo test (targeted new harness tests).

title: Public marketing site on GitHub Pages
description: Deliver a modern, static marketing website for Soundvibes that highlights minimal dependencies, automatic model download, and the simple start/toggle workflow. The site must be deployable on GitHub Pages and use GitHub Releases as the only distribution path referenced on the page. Non-goals: AUR or cargo install content, deep socket protocol detail.
acceptance_criteria:
Given the repository contains the new static site, when the GitHub Pages workflow runs on main, then the site builds and deploys successfully.
Given a fresh checkout, when running the automated build and UI smoke test commands, then they complete successfully.
Given the homepage content, when a user reads the page, then it communicates: minimal dependencies, auto model download, and the two-command service/toggle workflow without deep socket details.
close_reason: Delivered marketing site, tests, and GitHub Pages deployment

title: Scaffold static site (Astro + Tailwind)
description: Create a web/ site scaffold using Astro + Tailwind with base layout, design tokens, and npm scripts for dev/build/preview. Keep it fully static for GitHub Pages deployment.
acceptance_criteria: Given a clean checkout, when running: cd web && npm install && npm run build, then the build exits 0 and web/dist/index.html is generated.
close_reason: Scaffolded Astro + Tailwind site with build and smoke test

title: Implement homepage layout and copy
description: Build the homepage structure and copy: hero, why section (minimal deps + auto model), workflow (sv daemon start / sv toggle), quickstart (GitHub Releases only), use cases, FAQ, and footer. Keep socket details minimal and focus on the two commands.
acceptance_criteria: Given the homepage content is implemented, when running: cd web && npm run build, then the site builds successfully without errors.
close_reason: Completed homepage copy with use cases and FAQ

title: Add logo usage and favicon set
description: Integrate the existing Soundvibes logo into the site and create a simplified favicon set that matches the logo color theme. Wire the favicon assets into the HTML head.
acceptance_criteria: Given branding assets are added, when running: cd web && npm run build, then the build succeeds and favicon assets exist in web/public (e.g., favicon.svg, favicon.ico, apple-touch-icon.png).
close_reason: Added logo image and favicon assets

title: Add automated UI smoke tests
description: Add Playwright-based smoke tests that verify the hero CTA and quickstart sections render. Provide npm scripts to run tests headlessly. Use agent-browser for an automated visual sanity check during development.
acceptance_criteria:
Given the test setup, when running: cd web && npm run test:e2e, then the smoke tests pass in headless mode.
Given the dev server is running, when using agent-browser to open the homepage, then the hero and quickstart sections are visible.
close_reason: Added Playwright smoke tests and config

title: Add GitHub Pages deployment workflow
description: Add a GitHub Actions workflow that builds the static site and deploys it to GitHub Pages. The workflow must run the automated UI smoke tests before deploy.
acceptance_criteria: Given a push to main, when GitHub Actions runs, then the workflow builds, runs npm run test:e2e, and deploys the web/dist artifact to GitHub Pages.

title: CLI: add daemon subcommands start/stop/set-model
description:
Summary: Replace the --daemon flag with a daemon subcommand that supports start/stop/set-model while keeping plain sv as the toggle command.

Scope: Refactor clap CLI in src/main.rs to introduce "sv daemon start", "sv daemon stop", "sv daemon set-model --size <SIZE> --model-language <LANG>". Remove the --daemon flag entirely and update command routing logic to use subcommands. Keep sv (no args) sending toggle to the socket as current behavior.

Success: Running sv daemon start launches the daemon; sv daemon stop requests shutdown; sv daemon set-model --size small --model-language en sends a set-model command. sv (no args) still toggles capture via the socket. --daemon no longer appears in help output.

Tests/Acceptance: Existing CLI unit tests updated or new tests added to cover the subcommand parsing and routing; acceptance tests updated in separate task.

title: Enable GPU backends (Vulkan/CUDA) in build
description: Enable whisper.cpp build flags for Vulkan (AMD/NVIDIA) and CUDA (NVIDIA) so GPU backends are available when supported. Ensure CPU build still works when GPU SDKs are missing.

title: Tests: update acceptance for daemon subcommands and set-model
description:
Summary: Update automated acceptance tests to use the new daemon subcommands and validate model switching via set-model.

Scope: Modify tests/acceptance.rs to start the daemon with "sv daemon start" and stop with "sv daemon stop" where applicable. Add or extend an acceptance test that issues "sv daemon set-model --size <SIZE> --model-language <LANG>" and verifies the daemon acknowledges or uses the new model (via expected log output or state used by test-support mocks).

Success: Acceptance tests compile and pass with the new CLI syntax. At least one acceptance test covers set-model and asserts the daemon reload path was exercised.

Tests/Acceptance: Run `cargo test --test acceptance --features test-support` to validate changes.

title: Auto-select GPU backend with CPU fallback
description: Use whisper.cpp runtime params to enable GPU usage by default, detect supported NVIDIA/AMD devices, and fall back to CPU with clear logs. No user GPU selection required.

title: Add error handling and exit codes
description: Implement consistent error handling for missing model and invalid device from config.toml. Map exit codes to PRD: 2 for invalid config/missing model, 3 for audio device errors. Success: acceptance tests AT-02 and AT-03 pass with correct exit codes and messages.

title: Daemon: add stop/set-model socket commands and hot reload
description:
Summary: Extend the daemon socket protocol to support stop and set-model commands, and implement hot-reload of the transcriber based on model size/language.

Scope: Update src/daemon.rs socket listener to parse "stop" and "set-model" commands; add ControlEvent variants (e.g., Stop, SetModel). Implement model reload by resolving a ModelSpec (size + model_language) and loading a new transcriber. On set-model, stop active capture and require a manual toggle to resume. Stop command should trigger a clean shutdown path.

Success: Sending "stop" shuts down the daemon gracefully. Sending "set-model --size <SIZE> --model-language <LANG>" reloads the model and logs confirmation. No crashes when set-model is issued while recording (recording stops cleanly).

Tests/Acceptance: Covered by acceptance test updates in separate task; add unit tests in daemon module if needed.

title: AT-01 daemon starts with valid model
description:
Goals: Cover acceptance test AT-01 with an automated test that verifies the daemon starts with a valid model path.

Plan: Add an integration test that runs the binary with a temp config pointing to a real model (SV_MODEL_PATH), starts the daemon, and shuts it down cleanly.
acceptance_criteria: Validation: cargo test --test acceptance (AT-01). Use SV_MODEL_PATH when required.

title: Implement text injection backends
description: Add a text output abstraction with backends for Wayland (portal virtual keyboard/input capture) and X11 (XTest). Inject transcribed text at the focused cursor when mode=inject, with fallback to stdout and clear errors when unavailable.
